Dear ladies! Dear mothers and sisters! I heartily congratulate all women of Azerbaijan on International Women's Day.
In every epoch of our history, our women have become an indestructible moral base of our society, and our country (cont) http://t.co/uQ4svSbD
They have the right to be elected and elected by women from many leading countries in the world (cont) http://t.co/RKdibt2b
Complete the power of its inexhaustible energy and intelligence in the path of nationwide (cont) http://t.co/tU7SCU7P
Azerbaijan woman closely around the idea of ​​independence of our people is today national state (cont) http://t.co/menDxT1N
The ever-growing influence of women in our society and the current high public position are a remarkable event of modern Azerbaijani life.
I believe that Azerbaijani woman will continue to do so for the sake of dynamic development and progress of our republic.
I wish you all good health, happiness and new successes in your work. Happy Holidays!

Socialists are now gathered, as never in our history. #Reims # FH2012
I came to #Reims to greet a woman elected from a city of 100,000 inhabitants, Adeline Hazan! # 8mars # FH2012
I want to salute all the elected representatives of France who work to change the lives of the women and men of our country. # 8mars # FH2012
Feminism is a lever of transformation for a society like ours. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Feminism is a social fight! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
The struggle for the rights of women is the struggle for the humble, the forgotten, the offended. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
We must have audacity! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
It is with daring, courage and will that we will transform our country! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Feminism is not the monopoly of a political party. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
It's up to all women and men to fight for dignity! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
For feminism and equality, it's time to open a new page! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
A story was interrupted, a thread broke. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
I ask you to resume the walk! #Reims 8mars # FH2012
Equality between women and men is a priority. #Reims
I will form a joint government. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
All major instances of the Republic will also be parity. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
The boards of directors of public companies will also be joint! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
We will recreate a Ministry of Women's Rights. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Today the average salary of women is 25% lower than men's wages. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
At equal responsibilities, women's pay is 20% lower. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
I will give big companies a year to comply with the law. A year and not a day more. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Then these big companies will lose the benefits of social security contributions on these jobs. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
If I am elected, contraception for minors will be really confidential. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
We will enforce respect for parity in parliamentary elections. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Political parties that do not respect parity will lose all state grants. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Women are the first victims of precarious employment. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
The care of young children must become a real public service. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
A woman who can not keep her children is not a free woman. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
I will lengthen the paternity leave. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
All hospitals in our country must have an IVG center. And I want this act to be 100% refunded. #Reims # 8mars
Every two days in our country, a woman dies under the blows of her spouse. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
It is not up to the woman victim to leave her home, but to the violent spouse. We will impose on him the force of the law. #Reims # 8mars
Republic is freedom! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
To those who tolerate the oppression of women, to all these fundamentalists, I say that France will always fight them. #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
The Republic is fraternity! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
I address myself to all the women of France: I want to tell them my gratitude, my gratitude and my commitment! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
The Republic must be secular! Secularism is our ability to live together! #Reims 8mars # FH2012
The Republic must be secular! Secularism is our ability to live together! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
Secularism, enshrined in the constitution, will be a protection for women! #Reims # 8mars # FH2012
What is expected of a President of the Republic is not that he speaks of himself but of the French. #Reims # FH2012
We do not wait for the President of states of souls but of service! #Reims # FH2012
I want the campaign to be useful to France and the French. #Reims # FH2012
A useful campaign for citizens is a campaign that illuminates and not that aims to impress. #Reims # FH2012
I assume the balance of the left! #Reims # FH2012
I will defend what was the history of the Republic, and the history of the left. #Reims # FH2012
Nothing would be worse than betting on abstention! #Reims # FH2012
It's your decision that will count! #Reims # FH2012
It is incredible that the President only learns now that only 10% of the unemployed are trained! #Reims # FH2012
Our first goal is to straighten the country! #Reims # FH2012
France needs Europe, and Europe needs France! #Reims # FH2012
We must win for ourselves, for our ideas, but also and especially for the Republic! #Reims # FH2012
Make with me the choice of change! #Reims # FH2012
